courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Architecture.
description: Design studio investigations of multiple techniques and methodologies addressing the design and fabrication of small-scale architectural constructions, explorations of specific sites and places, and interdisciplinary projects. Field trips may be required. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Architecture.
label: Design:Detail & Architectonics
